bioghist.p: Margaret Scattergood (1894-1986) graduated from Bryn Mawr College in 1917.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers of Margery Scattergood. Included are academic notebooks and English composition papers written while Scattergood was a student at Bryn Mawr; academic notebooks from her time at the University of Edinburgh; and correspondence with fellow members of the Class of 1917 and the Alumnae Association.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
